languages.text: "Хм. Один из пилотов шаттла, на котором мы спустились, покончил с собой вскоре после того полета. Впрочем, его тело давно сожгли, так что беспокоиться не о чем".
"Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."
languages.original_text: "Хм. Один из пилотов шаттла, на котором мы спустились, покончил с собой вскоре после того полета. Впрочем, его тело давно сожгли, так что беспокоиться не о чем".

"Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."

languages.text: “嗯，其中一名穿梭机驾驶员在那次航行之后不久，就自杀身亡了。不过，他的尸体早就被焚化了，所以没什么好担心的。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，其中一名穿梭机驾驶员在那次航行之后不久，就自杀身亡了。不过，他的尸体早就被焚化了，所以没什么好担心的。”

languages.text: « Hmm... L'un des pilotes de navette s'est suicidé peu après l'incident, mais son corps a rapidement été incinéré, donc je pense pas qu'il y ait la moindre inquiétude à avoir. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... L'un des pilotes de navette s'est suicidé peu après l'incident, mais son corps a rapidement été incinéré, donc je pense pas qu'il y ait la moindre inquiétude à avoir. »

languages.text: «Mmm. Uno de los pilotos de lanzadera se suicidó poco después de ese vuelo, pero incineramos el cadáver hace tiempo, por lo que ya no hay de qué preocuparse».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm. Uno de los pilotos de lanzadera se suicidó poco después de ese vuelo, pero incineramos el cadáver hace tiempo, por lo que ya no hay de qué preocuparse».

languages.text: 「ふむ。シャトルパイロットの一人が、フライト後間もなく自殺しました。ですが遺体は焼却後ずいぶん経っていますから、心配は無用です」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。シャトルパイロットの一人が、フライト後間もなく自殺しました。ですが遺体は焼却後ずいぶん経っていますから、心配は無用です」

languages.text: "Hmm. Einer der Shuttle-Piloten hat sich kurz nach diesem Flug das Leben genommen. Sein Leichnam ist aber längst eingeäschert, es besteht also kein Grund zur Sorge."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. One of the shuttle pilots died by suicide shortly after that flight. His body has long since been incinerated, though, so there is nothing to worry about."

languages.text: "Hımm. Mekik pilotlarından biri, uçuştan kısa süre sonra kendi canına kıymıştı. Cesedin çoktan yakıldı ama. Endişelenecek bir şey yok."
